description: The action to update the test set.

parameters.name: testSetId
parameters.description: The test set Id for which update test operation to be performed.

nested_items.name: testSetId
nested_items.description: The test set Id for which update test operation to be performed.

nested_items.name: testSetName
nested_items.description: The test set name for the updated test set.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The test set description for the updated test set.

nested_items.name: modality
nested_items.description: Indicates whether audio or text is used for the updated test set.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status for the updated test set.

nested_items.name: roleArn
nested_items.description: The roleARN used for any operation in the test set to access resources in the Amazon Web Services account.

nested_items.name: numTurns
nested_items.description: The number of conversation turns from the updated test set.

nested_items.name: storageLocation
nested_items.description: The Amazon S3 storage location for the updated test set.

nested_items.name: s3BucketName
nested_items.description: The name of the Amazon S3 bucket in which the test set is stored.

nested_items.name: s3Path
nested_items.description: The path inside the Amazon S3 bucket where the test set is stored.

nested_items.name: kmsKeyArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an Amazon Web Services Key Management Service (KMS) key for encrypting the test set.

nested_items.name: creationDateTime
nested_items.description: The creation date and time for the updated test set.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time of the last update for the updated test set.
